message: He slowly removes the mask to reveal...
...the same face I saw yesterday.
Clear looks up at me with obvious concern.
He looks so much like a puppy. I smile and pat his head.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I already told you, it's fine. I won't ever hate you."

name: クリア
message: "Really?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: クリア
message: "...Thank goodness."
He smiles.

name: クリア
message: "Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"

name: クリア
message: "I have something to ask you. Is that alright?"
He straightens and gives me a serious look.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sure."

name: クリア
message: "Thank you. Um, so I've been curious about this for a while, but... do you ever get nervous when you go to bed?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...When I go to bed? You mean when I sleep?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. Don't you ever worry that you might... stop breathing?"

name: クリア
message: "That you might die in your sleep and never wake up to see tomorrow?"
The question takes me a bit off-guard.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I can't say I've never thought about it, but I don't think I've ever gotten anxious about it."

name: クリア
message: "Really? Why not?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why? Well... Hmm, I mean, I guess you just don't usually think about it that much."

name: クリア
message: "But there's no guarantee it won't happen, so why?"

name: クリア
message: "Your life is finite. Doesn't that terrify you?"

name: クリア
message: "Don't you wonder what the point of living is if there's an end?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Clear?"

name: クリア
message: "Haven't you ever wondered about the meaning of life?"

name: クリア
message: "Don't you ever wonder why you're alive right now?"
How am I supposed to respond to that?
